content: 2 above knit remaining stitches which should be the same as the number of stitches you knit at the beginning of the row next row knit to bind off co number of stitches that you bound off in previous row using cable knit on co method https //www purlsoho com/create/2008/07/07/cable- cast-on/ or your preferred co stitch knit to end of row knit back to match front until both sides are the same length this will bring you to the underarm we are now ready to join the front with the back and begin knitting in the round from this point on you will use the round lace stitch patterns d - g 5 joining put provisional stitches on the 32 circular needle using this needle knit across the garment front that is on the shorter circular needle 24 which will knit the stitches off that needle and put them on the longer circular needle you will now have all stitches on one needle join back and knit across pm and join to front from here on out you will be knitting in the round continue knitting round lace stitch patterns d-g each separated by 4 row of round garter stitch until desired length is reached ending with a ws row finish with 1- 1½ round garter stitch bobble flat lace stitch patterns when knitting back and forth flat garter - knit every row a flat eyelet lace stitch row 1 knit row 2 & 4 purl row 3 k2 *yo k2tog k1 repeat from * to end k any extra stitches at end of row b flat dropped stitch row 1 k1 with three wraps around repeat to end of row row 2 purl dropping wraps c flat solid mesh stitch row 1 knit row 2 4 6 8 purl row 3 right side knit 1 *yo slip 1 stitch knitwise knit 2 pass slipped stitch over them psso repeat from * to end k any extra stitches at end of row row 5 right side *yo slip 1 stitch knitwise knit 2 psso repeat from * to end k any extra stitches at end of row row 7 right side knit 2 *yo slip 1 stitch knitwise knit 2 psso repeat from * to end k any extra stitches at end of row 6 round lace stitch patterns when knitting in the round round garter knit 1 row purl 1 row knit 1 row purl 1 row d round eyelet stitch row 1 2 & 4 knit row 3 k2 *yo k2tog k1 repeat from * to end k any extra stitches at end of row e round dropped stitch row 1 k with three wraps around in each stitch repeat to end of row row 2 knit dropping wraps f round netting stitch row 1 *yo k2tog repeat to end knitting any extra stitches row 2-8 repeat row 1 g round mesh stitch row 1 & 2 knit row 3 *yo slip 1st knitwise k2 pass slipped stitch
